attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we enact that all crimes especially anti social behaviour, bullying, burglary, street robbery, membership of criminal gangs, gun and knife crime, harassment, child abuse and murder should be all treated as domestic terrorism.
All criminals must be microchip  
All criminals must be serialised
All criminals must be prevented from parenting
All criminals must be monitored by computer via the microchip 
All criminals must be given a curfew of 6:30pm
All criminals must only be given lower paid jobs or given community service permanently through out their life's
All criminals must be punishable under the terrorism act.

No citizen of the united Kingdom should be terrorised, one incident can damage a victim for life therefore all criminals must be given a microchip, curfew, monitored, sterilised and given community service for the rest of their life's.
